name: Flappy Bird Extra
description:
In 2014, a game called Flappy Bird went viral. The success became to much for the developer and the game was taken down quickly. This project's goal is to bring back Flappy Bird with more features, gamemodes and events.

Planned Features (These features will get added in the future!):

- Bird Skins
- Background Themes
- A Local-Multiplayer Mode
- New gamemodes
- A secret at score 999...
- And way more!
